781.quote: The deification of inanimate objects, corrupts true faith.
781.author: constart

782.quote: The spread of negative emotions, is identical to that of the diseases.
782.author: constart

783.quote: Luck, is the difference between two sets: the problems to solve, and the actions to tackle them.
783.author: constart

784.quote: In order to share, you must first acquire.
784.author: constart

785.quote: An effective way to shrink a negative situation* is to increase the proportion of people, available to fight it.
785.author: constart

786.quote: In life, we invest wrongly in the soul. And when we face the right source of energy, we retreat in defiance of its power.
786.author: constart

787.quote: The loss of a loved one, is equivalent to the inactivation of a part of the well regulated mental well being.
787.author: constart

788.quote: Learn to be grateful, every day of your life* to have a peaceful and honest breath.
788.author: constart

789.quote: The best gift you can offer your beloved ones, is your presence.
789.author: constart

790.quote: Material wealth, is generated, blossoms and dies* while spiritual wealth, is born, lives and breathes.
790.author: constart

791.quote: If you have not yet discovered the passion of life* then start the journey, before the sun sets.
791.author: constart

792.quote: Emotion, is the only currency that is not susceptible to deterioration* because it does not obey the malleability of reason.
792.author: constart

793.quote: You have within you, everything you need to acquire* and by honest action, the gifts of the soul to conquer.
793.author: constart

794.quote: Greatness, is shaped by faith, action and dignity.
794.author: constart

795.quote: If you wish to change the equation of the world* start from its variables before you carve the view.
795.author: constart

796.quote: The value of every living breath* is the divine offering, at the pinnacle of life.
796.author: constart

797.quote: In a world, where heroism and bravery have been lost* be the cause of the resurrection of ideas, that have been eroded.
797.author: constart

798.quote: The sign of the energy, that your life deposits* is the weight of the choices, that your action makes up.
798.author: constart

799.quote: It is said, that eros and love, have a heterotic time* but they are concepts of the same kind, whose superposition causes the difference.
799.author: constart

800.quote: Destiny, is an unparallel segment, with given edges* an unwritten book, longing to be raised by a pen.
800.author: constart

801.quote: The correct approach of arithmosophy* unveils the secrets, of universal symmetry.
801.author: constart

802.quote: The totality of universal knowledge* can be traced back to the arithmosophy, of the greek language.
802.author: constart

803.quote: The ideological conflict, that plagues the modern age* is due to man's alienation, from the Supreme Authority.
803.author: constart

804.quote: Man, is born to reshape life* while woman is born, to create a virtuous breath.
804.author: constart

805.quote: When a loved one, is gone from your life* then you will understand their value, directly to your soul.
805.author: constart

806.quote: It is wonderful when someone you love, shares their soul with you* giving you secrets, hidden in their chest of silence.
806.author: constart

807.quote: The eloquent melodies of music* promote the three-dimensional structure, to the highest harmonic sequences.
807.author: constart

808.quote: True friendship, in human life* is the joint contribution, that renews the current flow.
808.author: constart

809.quote: A person's value at a point in time* is the average of the choices, that got him there.
809.author: constart

810.quote: The vow of life, is special, unique* it is the virtues that guide man, towards the eternal gate of life.
810.author: constart

811.quote: The more I pursue the truth* the more my soul is attracted, to one and only one God.
811.author: constart

812.quote: If you ask to revive yourself* then embrace values, that will make you flourish.
812.author: constart

813.quote: The negative response to our past mistakes* brings a similar invocation to our future burdens.
813.author: constart

814.quote: If you are waiting for the ideal conditions to begin* then the battle is lost, before you start.
814.author: constart

815.quote: If you really want to give meaning to your life* take on responsibilities, beyond your status.
815.author: constart

816.quote: Our detachment, from modern paranoia* is necessary, for the path to intellect.
816.author: constart

817.quote: There is a linear relativity* in the time aspects, that define perceived reality.
817.author: constart

818.quote: The only certainty, is the uncertainty of the existential cause.
818.author: constart

819.quote: The differentiation between the victors and the defeated, does not lie in the final goal* but in the strategy of implementation towards it.
819.author: constart

820.quote: Generalized intelligence, is superior to specialized intelligence.
820.author: constart

821.quote: Hyperanalysis, is not always fatal* since it eliminates extreme logical errors.
821.author: constart

822.quote: Human genius, is the spiritual epicenter, delineate by our psychic genius.
822.author: constart

823.quote: Substatic self-mastery, is shaped by our inherent discipline.
823.author: constart

824.quote: Writing, is the way, that the heart attempts to express itself.
824.author: constart

825.quote: The military, must teach discipline* by fostering values and morals, that promote education.
825.author: constart

826.quote: Life is wonderful, as long as you see its joys* bear its sorrows and overcome its changes.
826.author: constart

827.quote: Your first love, let it be an idea* for it is an eternal, fatal aspect of life.
827.author: constart

828.quote: The souls that are united, by their mutual faith* are both trapped, in their love bladder.
828.author: constart

829.quote: Man, is easily carried away by himself* betraying both his dream and Creator.
829.author: constart

830.quote: The only way to keep a relationship* is for the couple's heart, to live inside the habit of love.
830.author: constart

831.quote: The informational organization, of ideological cosmology* deconstructs the spectrum, of mental paralogy.
831.author: constart

832.quote: No one will understand you more than yourself* because he is your only friend and your fellow man.
832.author: constart

833.quote: I have the power to change you, if you let me* give me the key to your heart and appreciate me.
833.author: constart
